chats.title: Your Chats
chats.emptyDescription: Import a WhatsApp chat to get started
chats.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
chats.clearAllMessage: Remove all chats and insights from your device.

importGuide.title: How to Import
importGuide.subtitle: WhatsApp Chat Export Guide
importGuide.intro: Import your WhatsApp conversation to analyze your relationship dynamics and communication patterns.

steps.step2Description: Enter the chat you want to analyze
steps.step3DescriptionIOS: Tap on the contact or group name at the top of the chat, scroll all the way down and tap "Export Chat"
steps.step3DescriptionAndroid: Tap the three dots (⋮) and select "More" → "Export Chat"
steps.step4Description: Choose "Without Media" when prompted (media files are not needed for analysis)
steps.step5Description: Select "Bonobo" from the share menu to import the chat

paywall.title: Unlock AI Insights
paywall.subtitle: Get deep relationship analysis powered by advanced AI
paywall.secureSubtitle: Create an account to access your insights from any device and keep your purchases safe
paywall.secureSubtitleShort: Create an account to access your insights from any device

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.message: All chat data is stored securely on your device. We never upload your conversations to our servers. AI analysis is performed using encrypted requests.
privacy.dataSecure: Your data is private and secure. We only use your email to help you access your account.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

import.successMessage: Chat between {{participants}} with {{count}} messages has been imported.
import.zipExtractionFailedMessage: Could not extract chat content from the ZIP file. Please try exporting the chat as "Without Media" or use manual import.
import.zipProcessingErrorMessage: An error occurred while processing the ZIP file. Please try again or use manual import.
import.noTextDataMessage: No text data was found in the shared content. Please try exporting the chat again or use manual import.

redFlags.title: Red Flags
redFlags.explanationText: We analyze subtle patterns in how conflicts start, how boundaries are respected, and whether concerns get dismissed or heard. What seems like small moments can reveal larger dynamics worth addressing early.

greenFlags.title: Green Flags
greenFlags.explanationText: Beyond obvious positivity, we look for signs of emotional safety, mutual support during stress, and how you handle vulnerability. These patterns predict long-term relationship satisfaction better than chemistry alone.

compatibilityScore.title: Compatibility Score
compatibilityScore.explanationText: This score weighs communication rhythm, conflict resolution styles, and emotional reciprocity - not just shared interests. High compatibility means less friction in daily interactions, though growth is always possible with awareness.

loveLanguage.title: Love Language
loveLanguage.explanationText: We detect whether you show affection through words, actions, or quality time. Mismatched love languages cause 'invisible effort' - you're trying, but your partner can't feel it. Alignment multiplies impact.

weVsIRatio.title: "We" vs "I" Language
weVsIRatio.explanationText: Research shows couples who naturally use "we" language have lower stress hormones during conflicts and stay together longer. But too much can indicate codependency - the sweet spot balances partnership with individuality.

sharedInterests.title: Shared Interests
sharedInterests.unlockText: What do you have in common?
sharedInterests.explanationText: Shared interests matter less than you think - but shared curiosity matters more. Couples who explore new things together maintain attraction longer than those who just share existing hobbies. Growth > overlap.

reciprocityScore.title: Reciprocity Score
reciprocityScore.explanationText: We track who initiates, who asks questions, and who does emotional labor. Perfect 50/50 is rare - but imbalances over 70/30 often breed resentment. Awareness of patterns is the first step to rebalancing.

attachmentStyle.title: Attachment Style
attachmentStyle.explanationText: Your attachment style, formed in childhood, shapes how you handle closeness and conflict today. Anxious-avoidant pairings create push-pull dynamics. But attachment isn't fixed - with awareness, you can develop more secure patterns.

compliments.title: Compliments
compliments.explanationText: Gottman's research found stable couples maintain 5 positive interactions for every negative one. We analyze compliment frequency, specificity, and timing. Generic praise matters less than noticing specific efforts.

criticism.title: Criticism
criticism.explanationText: Gottman identifies criticism (attacking character vs behavior) as a relationship killer. We detect patterns of contempt, defensiveness, and stonewalling - the warning signs before relationships end. Early detection allows course correction.

conflictResolution.title: Conflict Resolution
conflictResolution.explanationText: During conflict, we track 'repair attempts' - small gestures to de-escalate tension. Successful couples make and accept these bids 86% of the time. Failed repairs predict breakups more accurately than the conflict itself.

relationshipTips.title: Relationship Tips
relationshipTips.explanationText: Based on your specific patterns, we suggest micro-adjustments with outsized impact. Small changes in how you respond during stress or ask questions can shift relationship trajectories significantly over time.

analysisScreen.chatNotFoundMessage: The requested chat could not be found.

profileScreen.accountCreationInfo: Don't have an account? Create one after making a purchase to save your insights.
